name: Strike Ops - Online
description:
Strike ops is a online multiplayer fps counter-strike style game. This game is currently on early access. 

Controls:
WASD+mouse
1,2,3 - Change weapons
Y - team chat
T - lobby chat
C - crouch
Shift - sprint
B - buy menu
F - use
Space - jump

All controls can be changed in the options menu.

How To Play:
Kill people, earn money, buy weapons and show your skills to your friend or other people around the world.
